creator: mrfx@wla.pl
text:
Alias and AliasMatch only work for ServerName in VirtualHost.
They don't work for ServerAlias.

This doesn't make sense. In what way do they not work?

At a guess, it appears that you have an invalid vhost configuration, but given the lack of detail here I'm 
going to close this bug as invalid. If you're having trouble with your apache configuration, please contact 
the users@httpd.apache.org mailing list or #apache freenode IRC channel.
creator: noodl@apache.org

text:
I found the problem was more complex and was probably connected with some cache.
Anyway it wasn't directly connected with alias. I've got some wildcard
sub-domains and VirtualHosts for them. Mod_alias.so was disabled and there was
bad regexp ealier, but after fixed it and restarted apache (even many restarts)
things hadn't change. Now it works fine. Can't yet explain it accurately.
creator: mrfx@wla.pl
